sentences.en: £2,500 for software is soon swallowed up in general costs.
sentences.cn: 用于软件方面的2,500英镑很快就被一般性费用耗光了。

sentences.en: a four-star general
sentences.cn: 四星上将

sentences.en: a general introduction to computing
sentences.cn: 计算机应用概论

sentences.en: Caesar was the general of Rome.
sentences.cn: 恺撒是罗马的盖世将军。

sentences.en: general cooking and cleaning
sentences.cn: 一般的做饭和清洁工作

sentences.en: General Rudnicki was a moral beacon for many exiled Poles.
sentences.cn: 鲁德尼茨基将军是众多被放逐的波兰人精神上的引路人。

sentences.en: He joined Sanders Roe, moving on later to become General Manager.
sentences.cn: 他加入了桑德斯·罗公司，后来一路晋升至总经理。

sentences.en: He spoke in general terms about greater competitiveness.
sentences.cn: 他大致地说了说要加强竞争力。

sentences.en: Howe carefully cultivated Daniel C. Roper, the Assistant Postmaster General.
sentences.cn: 豪谨慎地和邮政副部长丹尼尔·C.罗珀拉近关系。

sentences.en: I have a general idea of what I want to express.
sentences.cn: 我对自己想要表达什么有个大致的想法。

sentences.en: I skimmed through it to get a general impression of the text.
sentences.cn: 我把文章浏览了一下，让自己有个大致的了解。

sentences.en: In general, incumbents have a 94 per cent chance of being reelected.
sentences.cn: 通常现任官员有94%的几率会再次当选。

sentences.en: One of the company stepped out and saluted the General.
sentences.cn: 人群中走出一人向将军敬礼。

sentences.en: Patients are mostly referred to hospital by their general practitioners.
sentences.cn: 病人大多数是在他们的全科医生建议下转往医院就医。

sentences.en: Residents in general are poor and undereducated, and live in sub-standard housing.
sentences.cn: 居民们普遍都很贫穷，受教育程度低，居住条件较差。

sentences.en: She had a confused idea of life in general.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，她对生活非常困惑。

sentences.en: The country is in the throes of a general election.
sentences.cn: 该国正忙于大选。

sentences.en: The general designated an officer to the command.
sentences.cn: 该将军任命一名军官担任指挥官。

sentences.en: The General does not like non-combatant personnel near a scene of action.
sentences.cn: 将军不喜欢非战斗部队人员靠近战场。

sentences.en: The general slurred over his contribution to the campaign.
sentences.cn: 将军没提到他对这次战役所做的贡献。

sentences.en: The General's visit to Sarajevo is part of preparations for the deployment of extra troops.
sentences.cn: 那位将军对萨拉热窝的访问是为部署更多军队所做的准备工作的一部分。

sentences.en: The medical board would not pass him fit for General Service.
sentences.cn: 医疗卫生委员会不会批准他为全科医生。

sentences.en: The operation is carried out under a general anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 该手术是在全身麻醉情况下实施的。

sentences.en: There has been a general decline in standards.
sentences.cn: 道德水准普遍下降。

sentences.en: There is one exception to this general principle.
sentences.cn: 这个一般性原则有一例外

sentences.en: There was a general revaluation of other currencies but not the pound.
sentences.cn: 除了英镑以外，其他货币普遍都升值了。

sentences.en: This study is described under "General Diseases of the Eye"
sentences.cn: “普通眼科疾病”这一部分里对该项研究作了描述。

sentences.en: ways to improve your general health
sentences.cn: 全面提高身体素质的方法

words.tran_cn: 广义的，普遍的；无显著特点的
将军任期，军阶，地位或职权
（英）一般化；归纳；普遍原理（等于generalization）
（有多方面知识和经验的）通才；多面手
将才；将官的职位；将军任期
推广（generalize的过去分词）；对…进行概括；使…一般化
推广；笼统地讲；概括（等于generalize）

phrases.tran_cn: 一般信息；基本资料；总说明
一般原则；一般原理；普遍原理

trans.tran_cn: 全体的，一般的，普通的，大体的，广泛的，整体的，首席的
trans.tran_en: describing or relating to only the main features or parts of something, not the details
an officer of very high rank in the army or air force
